Videogame.title: Masks and Marquises, a Palau Moja's Story
Videogame.client: Giravolt Crea Lab Innovation Lab, formed by CITM-UPC and the Catalan Agency for Cultural Heritage through its Giravolt program.
Videogame.description: Design and development of a multiplayer VR game for Oculus Quest 3 set in the Baroque-era Palau Moja.
Videogame.long-description: Design and creation of a multiplayer virtual reality video game for Oculus Quest 3. The game is set in the Palau Moja during the Baroque era. On Carnival Day, a masquerade ball takes place. But unexpectedly, Antonio López, a wealthy man who hides many secrets and is also the host of the party, is found dead in the middle of the room. Players, as partners involved in fraudulent businesses, must destroy the evidence and avoid being killed by the infiltrator.
Videogame.fields: HUD Design, Visual Identity Design of the Game, 3D Modeling, 3D Model Texturing, Game Design
Videogame.software: Unity, Adobe Substance, Maya, Adobe Photoshop, Figma
